name: GroundHog
description:
GroundHog 🐷

A tiny puzzle-platformer made as part of Epic's MegaJam 2018. However it wasn't completed by the deadline and so wasn't submitted :( (it took 5 days to create though!).

Collect all gems 💎 to complete the level. Touching any surface orients gravity in that way - i.e. touch a wall to stick to walls. You'll get the hang of it.

Controls

Movement: WASD/Arrow keys or Left analog stick
Jump: Spacebar or (A) button
Move camera: Mouse or Right analog stick
Quit: Escape

Price

Would recommend downloading for free; it's only a quick 1-level prototype. Don't feel bad! However any donations would be very much appreciated and will win you a credit in any future projects ;)
